title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: This bug report is about the inconsistency in the format of datetime values displayed in dynamic text items and data/text items when retrieved from a table.
OB: Datetime values retrieved from a table display in different formats in dynamic text items and data/text items. Specifically, the dynamic text item displays the datetime value differently from the data/text item.
EB: When datetime values are retrieved from a table and displayed in dynamic text items, they should be in the same format as when displayed in data/text items. We expect both the dynamic text item and the data/text item to show the datetime values in the same format.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Retrieve datetime values from a table.
2. Set these values as content for three items - a dynamic text item, a data/text item, and another data/text item.
3. Save the changes and preview the items.
4. The expected result is that all three items should display the datetime values in the same format. The actual result is that the data and the first data/text item show the datetime values in the same format, but the dynamic text item displays it differently.
